name: Setris
description:
Setris is a game that plays like Tetris, but the objective is not clearing the lines to get high score, but it's assembling pieces to form certain shapes.

[Features]

  • Creative twist on the rule of Tetris
  • 20+ shapes to assemble
  • Minimalistic, but effective grahpics made with only 4 colors
  • QoL features such as undo system, hard drop, and auto-save

In case you're stuck, you can watch the youtube video embedded here for solution.

My first game made with Godot engine. Enjoy :)

[Links in the Credits]
